Question
========

One takes a sample of 8 individuals from a population and measures their weight loss (in kg) after following a 12-week diet, with the following results:______. 12, 7, 2, 5, 12, 20, 3, 8. The median of the sample is

Answerlist
----------

* 5
* 7
* 7.5
* 8.5

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 5: Incorrect
* 7: Incorrect
* 7.5: Correct
* 8.5: Incorrect
